high_descs: Go forward and take a right at the shelves and take a left when you get to the bed then go forward and take a right at the desk and go to the dresser.
Pick up the keys from the right of the pen on top of the dresser.
Take a left and go forward to the end of the dresser and face the dresser.
Turn on the lamp to the left of the pen on top of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: To get keys off the dresser and turn on the lamp on the dresser.

high_descs: Head to the dresser in the right corner of the room.
Pick up the keys from the dresser.
Walk towards the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a set of keys by the light of a table lamp.

high_descs: Head straight towards the chair and then turn right towards the drawer.
Pick up the keys from the drawer.
Turn left, walk towards the window, and then turn right to face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the keys by the light of a lamp.
